GroupBooking.title: Request a group booking
GroupBooking.description: Planning a group event and need 10 or more rooms? Fill out the form below! Once weâ€™ve received your request, our group booking team will be in touch.
GroupBooking.bookerType: What type of booker are you?
GroupBooking.stayPurpose: Is your group staying for Business or Leisure?
GroupBooking.schoolGroup: Please tick this box if you are booking for a school or youth group.
GroupBooking.reasonForVisit: What is the reason for your group's visit?
GroupBooking.packageInfo: Subject to availability. Room only not available for group bookings.
GroupBooking.roomSelect: Select the maximum number of rooms required by room type and occupancy.
GroupBooking.roomRules: At least one adult (18+) must be in every room with a child under 16 years.
GroupBooking.additionalNotesWords: Let us know if you have any additional information or special requests. If you do not require the same number of rooms on each night of your stay, please state below the number and type of rooms required each night.
GroupBooking.groupBookingRestrictions: Group bookings require a minimum of 10 rooms. For a group booking of 6 to 9 rooms, call us on 0333 003 8101. For a group booking of up to 5 rooms,

errors.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid 10-digit phone number
errors.bookerType: Please select a type of booker before proceeding
errors.stayPurpose: Please select the nature of your stay.
errors.hotel: Please select the hotel you would like to make a booking.
errors.invalidCheckout: Check-out date must be after check-in date.
